price: Kuma da waɗansu, sun yi furuci* da laifinsu, sun haɗa aiki na ƙwarai da wani mummuna. Akwai tsammãnin Allah Ya karɓi tũba a kansu. Lallai Allah ne Mai gãfara, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ ٱعۡتَرَفُواْ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ خَلَطُواْ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا وَءَاخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
footnotes: * Wata ƙungiya wadda ta yi munãfunci, tã ƙi fitã zuwa yãƙi amma kuma suka ga sun yi laifi suka yi iƙirãri da cewa, "Sun yi laifi," sa'an nan suka tũba, Allah Ya karɓi tũbarsu.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
